âœ¨ Key Features: â€¢ Translates Rust code to Coq â€¢ Enables formal verification of Rust programs â€¢ Provides a standard library for Rust in Coq â€¢ Offers semi-automated refinement steps (links and simulations) â€¢ Allows proving specifications with any possible user input
ðŸ“– Summary: Coq-of-rust is a formal verification tool that translates Rust code into the Coq proof system. This allows developers to mathematically prove the correctness of their Rust programs, ensuring they meet their specifications for all possible inputs. The tool includes features for translation, refinement, and specification, ultimately aiming to reduce bugs and vulnerabilities to zero.
